measured_by: retrospective duration estimation task (participants typed their average time estimates)
justification: “Participants were asked to provide an estimate of the average waiting, in-vehicle, and walking times per bus journey during the animated condition. This procedure of collecting judgments about perceived time is an example of retrospective estimation.”

topic_or_construct: Aversion to waiting time (relative preference for waiting vs in-vehicle time)
measured_by: binary bus-route choice scenarios presented in animated and numerical formats
justification: “Participants were asked to choose their preferred bus route… scenarios S3 and S4 show routes with the same overall journey time but with different proportions of waiting time… we refer to this phenomenon as aversion to waiting time.”

topic_or_construct: Relative importance of waiting, in-vehicle, and journey times
justification: “Participants were also asked to use a scale from 0 to 100 to state the relative importance of waiting, in-vehicle, and journey times when traveling on public transport.”
